snippet: Elizabeth Warren, the Democratic candidate, is relying on an extensive ground operation to try to unseat Senator Scott P. Brown.
abstract: Elizabeth Warren, Democratic contender for Senate in Massachusetts, is using extensive ground operation of over 24,000 volunteers in her efforts to win seat; her Republican opponent, Sen Scott P Brown, is relying on his personal, charismatic style to appeal to voters.
lead_paragraph: Elizabeth Warren, the Democratic candidate, is relying on an extensive ground operation to try to unseat Senator Scott P. Brown.

headline.main: Groundwork Meets Charm Offensive in Massachusetts Senate Race
headline.print_headline: Groundwork Meets Charm Offensive in Massachusetts Senate Race
